name: Cubase Expression Map File
summary: Learn about .EXPRESSIONMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Expression maps are used for defining articulations with different types of instruments so they sound more like an authentic human player and less sampled. Example filenames include Acoustic Bass.expressionmap and Brass Section.expressionmap.

description: File used by Cubase, a digital audio workstation (DAW) application; contains settings that alter the style of a sampled instrument with player expressions, such as staccatos and tremolos.
